trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>evento si verifica solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>proprietà è impostata o dai relativi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a cell.
trans-unit.target: Quando si gestisce il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>evento, viene visualizzato il menu di scelta rapida che specifica nel gestore di ogni volta che l'utente fa una cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to display shortcut menus determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Ciò è utile quando si desidera visualizzare il menu di scelta rapida in base allo stato corrente o al valore di una cella.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks the cell.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>evento si verifica anche ogni volta che il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà viene recuperata, a livello di codice o quando l'utente fa clic sulla cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>le proprietà per determinare lo stato o il valore di una cella e utilizzare queste informazioni per impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà viene inizializzata con il valore della cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>proprietà, che sostituisce il valore dell'evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: Gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>evento quando si lavora con grandi quantità di dati, per evitare il calo delle prestazioni dell'impostazione del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>valore per più celle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedure consigliate per ridimensionare il controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property or handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: È anche possibile specificare i menu di scelta rapida per le singole righe anziché le singole celle impostando la riga <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>proprietà o la gestione di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>del controllo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting overrides the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event and the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: La cella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>l'impostazione della proprietà esegue l'override della riga <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>impostazione della proprietà e il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>evento esegue l'override di entrambi i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>evento e la riga <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>l'impostazione della proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu, however, to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.
trans-unit.target: È possibile specificare `null` per un menu di scelta rapida cella, tuttavia, per impedire l'override di un menu di scelta rapida della riga.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: utilizzo degli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The column index of cell that the event occurred for.
trans-unit.target: Indice di colonna della cella in cui si è verificato l'evento per.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that the event occurred for.
trans-unit.target: Indice di riga della cella che si è verificato l'evento per.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the cell that raised the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il menu di scelta rapida per la cella che ha generato il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: This property initially contains the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if it has been set for a cell.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà contiene inizialmente il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà se è stata impostata per una cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
